name: Igus Game Jam
description:
===(Gameplay Instructions Below)===

This game is a part of the Igus Game Jam 2021, which took place at the Cologne Game Lab.

Igus GmbH is motion plastics manufacturer which designs and manufactures and several type of plastic profucts like, bearings, sliders, e-chains, etc.

The goal of this Game Jam was to create a game for Igus which will exhibit and spread knowledge about their products and their applications to the players in a fun way.

HOW TO PLAY:
You play as a Igus System Designer and the goal of the level is to create a coffee making machine according to client requirements. The requirements panel at the top tell you about the ingredients required and the order in which they are required.
1. You must now add the exact number of dispensers using the plus button according to the number of ingredients. Dispenser can be removed with the (X) button.
2. Next you must drag and drop the correct ingredients in the dispensers.
3. Drag and drop the other machine parts into the required slots.

Once everything is done, click 'SUBMIT DESIGN' to check your design and to know if you have cleared the level or not!

HAPPY AUTOMATED-SYSTEM DESIGNING!
